title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.19 - Rentals, leases, sale and lease-back, and lease-purchase arrangements for real property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.19 - Rentals, leases, sale and lease-back, and lease-purchase arrangements for real property

State Regulations

Allowable costs for real property will be limited to the
amount the provider of services could have included in reimbursable cost if the
provider of services had legal title to the property. The requirement may be
waived by the commissioner if the amount involved is found by the commissioner
to be reasonable, necessary and in the public interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
578.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
